artist: Artist: Cristy C. Road; Author: Sascha Scatter; Printer: Killer Banshee Studios; Publisher: Sascha Scatter , Berkeley
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of figure looking at train tracks, with text, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 42 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, xerography; bound volume
title: The Secret Life of White People (La Vida Secreta de los Gabachos)
